alert.note: Alert for Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 24 at 9:19PM CDT until June 25 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of west central Illinois, including the following counties, Adams and Pike. Portions of northeast Missouri, including the following county, Marion. * WHEN...Until 1230 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 919 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hannibal, Palmyra, Payson, Fall Creek, Adams, Liberty, Richfield, Plainville and Seehorn.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
